item.title: Setup
item.description: Reference video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=APOPm01BVrk Reference document: https://docs.python.org/3/library/venv.html Command: python -m venv By convention its good to create virtual environment with name of “venv”. This we can add in gitignore file as well. python -m venv venv First venv in above command is module name and second is the name of environment to be created. (base) C:\Users\Aadi>python --version (base) C:\Users\Aadi>python -m venv --help (base) C:\Users\Aadi>mkdir pyspark (base) C:\Users\Aadi>cd pyspark (base) C:\Users\Aadi\pyspark>python -m venv venv (base) C:\Users\Aadi\pyspark>.
